0.name: A Grassy Meadow
desc: "   You are standing in the middle of a grassy meadow.  The grass is
thick beneath your feet and dotted with purple irises and red poppies.  The
meadow is surrounded on three sides by copses of trees to the north, south and
east.  The western edge of the meadow is bordered by three Doric columns topped
by a narrow walkway.

1.name: A Copse of Trees
desc: "   You are in a copse of trees filled with with oaks, bay laurels,
and pine.  One majestic oak stands out in the center as if holding court for
the others.

2.name: Before the Majestic Oak
desc: "   A hallowed oak with age-old scars rises before you.  Upon closer inspection,
you see a multitude of gouges in its trunk at about shoulder height.  Some look recent and
others look like they have been there a long time.  The grass in front of the tree shows
signs of recent animal activity.

3.name: Statue of Artemis
desc: "   Before you stands a life-sized statue of the goddess Artemis.  Her marble
figure is accented in paints of rich tones of blue, red and gold.  Her face is white,
pristine and unscathed by the ravages of time.  Her lapis set eyes gaze upon you.
The smirk in her lips is flush and almost lifelike.  As you enter they shift to a
come-hither grin.

4.name: A Copse of Trees
desc: "   You are in a copse of trees filled with with oaks, bay laurels,
and pine. The path continues east towards a river.

5.name: By the Eridanos River
desc: "   You are in a forest of trees filled with with oaks, bay laurels,
and pine.  A sense of calm pervades you as you take in the Eridanos River that flows
before you.  Its dark blue waters sooth your soul offering relief from the tension that
permeates the air.  Rows of cattails line both banks.  A small footbridge offers crossing.

6.name: Marble Portico
desc: "   A marble portico with Doric columns stands before you.  It serves as a
gateway to the Avenue of the Dead.  Dazed and half-starved refugees file under the
arch joining others marching towards a distant temple off to the west.  Freshly healed
conscripts march the other way towards the steams of smoke that rise above the forest to the east.
